documents.document: Even the smallest dog can lift its leg on the tallest building. - Jim Hightower. (Activist)
Let no man in the world live in delusion. - Guru Nanak (Budhist Guru)
RT @OvertDictionary: Disney: a corporation which takes bright young and children and turns them into dull consumers of highly crafted image…
The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers. - Ralph Nader (Activist)
When I give food to the poor, they call me a saint. When I ask why the poor have no food, they call me a communist.� Camara
RT @The_RevoIution: I am the revolution and either you're for humanity or you're a mercenary in the pay of the capitalists.
All capitalists wanted from me was the most work for the least money. So I became a communist. � Nikita Khrushchev
The true revolutionary is guided by great feelings of love. � Che Guevara (Cuban Revolutionary)
RT @DearPornAddicts: Instead of spending hundreds of hours watching porn, revolutionize your life by revolutionizing your sexuality.
Our visions begin with our desires. - Audre Lorde (Activist)
If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all. - Noam Chomsky (Activist)
RT @JPMorgans: Investment bankers become very rich by speculating on the people's future.
The truth will set you free. But first, it will piss you off. - Gloria Steinem (Activist)
"I despise you. I despise your order, your laws, your force-propped authority.' HANG ME FOR IT!" - Louis Lingg (German Anarchist)
RT @Rosa__Luxemburg: Fuck the bondholders!
Usually when people are sad, they don't do anything. But when they get angry, the bring about a change. Malcolm X.
If you're not ready to die for it, put the word 'freedom' out of your vocabulary. Malcolm X.
RT @WoIIstonecraft: The revolutionary girl sees her individuality as a part of the collective spirit of revolt.
Truth is on the side of the oppressed. Malcolm X.
In my country we go to prison first and then become President. Nelson Mandela.
RT @PeopleYouNeed: Psychologically sober people, they will show you that the path of resistance is the path of coherence and logic.
The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe. You have to make it fall. Che Guevara.
History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as revolution. Karl Marx
RT @OvertDictionary: Our Children: they are our most creative hope, we should never sentence them to a life of pathetic aspiration to be we…
We have to talk about liberating minds as well as liberating society. Angela Davis.
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world. Nelson Mandela.
RT @OvertDictionary: Published Authors: their message always gets lost in the promotion and publicity hubbub.
I don't care if I fall as long as someone else picks up my gun and keeps on shooting. Che Guevara.
History does nothing; it does not possess immense riches, it does not fight battles. It is men real, living, who do all this. Karl Marx
Radical simply means 'grasping things at the root". Angela Davis.
RT @PoliticalLetter: Dear Talk Show Hosts: Stop using the opportunity to reach others on promoting shitty films and people; inject revoluti…
I'd rather have revolutionary plots on my table than diamonds on my neck. Emma Goldman.
There is no such thing as part freedom. Nelson Mandela.
RT @Shocking__Facts: In New York City, 80% of the NYPD stops were of African Americans and Latinos.
My fear is not of death itself, but death without meaning. Huey Newton.
A revolutionary woman can't have no reactionary man. Assata Shakur.
RT @JPMorgans: The stock market is nothing but a tool used to swindle the masses.
What this country needs is more unemployed politicians. Angela Davis.
I think what motivates people is not great hate, but great love for other people. Huey Newton.
RT @PopeJohnPaulll: The citizen becomes the wage-slave when he gives up his political rights for the sake of buying stuff.
"You cannot make a revolution with silk gloves." - Joseph Stalin
"I know and all the world knows, that revolutions never go backwards." - William Henry Seward
RT @RacismFacts: A 2008 study, found that the more a person watches television the more they tend to exhibit racist tendencies.
"You can jail a Revolutionary, but you can't jail the Revolution." - Huey Newton
"Can a nation be free if it oppresses other nations? It cannot" - Vladimir Lenin
RT @PoliticalLetter: Dear Factory Workers: Workers united, mobilized, and organized will crush the corporate masters and take over the mean…
"Without revolutionary theory there can be no revolutionary movement" - Vladimir Lenin
"We have no right to believe that freedom can be won without struggle" - Che Guevera
RT @Fred__Nietzsche: The active-passive nihilist dialectic is naturally inclined towards an eventual realization of mass action.
"We believe in constitutional action in normal times; we believe in revolutionary action in exceptional times" - James Connoly
"Every revolution was first a thought in one man's mind" - Ralph Waldo Emerson
RT @AntiThinkTanks: Think tanks are machines designed to lure politicians into the traps of false policies.
"Those who make peaceful revolution impossible, make violent revolution inevitable." - John F. Kennedy
"The only way to support a revolution is to make your own." - Abbie Hoffman
"Revolution begins with the self, in the self." - Toni Cade Bambara
"When dictatorship is a fact, revolution becomes a right." - Victor Hugo
RT @TextsToMyBoss: Wake up from the psychological stupor of capitalism. Do not allow yourself to be minced into corporate human capital.
The "people" who exercise the power are not always the same people with those over whom it is exercised. �J.S. Mill
The Establishment cannot survive without the obedience of millions who are given small rewards to keep the system going. �Zinn
RT @TextsToMyBoss: Wake up man. Stop aspiring to careerist success start aspiring to revolution.
The Establishment, whatever rewards it gives us, will also, if necessary to maintain its control, kill us. �Howard Zinn
The working class loses every election, regardless of whether a Democrat or a Republican is elected. �Pat Noble
RT @OvertDictionary: McDonald's: a corporation which makes it money by arguing that happiness is not necessarily dependent on good health.
Far too often we limit ourselves from doing the possible, by grandiose plans of the impossible. -Chuck Arnold
Leave things to the market, and there are thirty-five million people who go hungry. -Howard Zinn
RT @Mi2chaelJackson: Celebrities are propaganda puppets, they're designed to persuade people to watch more, shop more and think less.
When a social movement adopts the compromises of legislators, it has forgotten its role: to push and challenge politicians. -Zinn
Just remember two words: governments lie. -I.F. Stone
RT @OvertDictionary: The Church: they tell us of a God who will punish us in the afterlife if we protest against our oppressors in this lif…
The market system is what we've had. That's why we have 48 million people without health care. -Howard Zinn
RT @OvertDictionary: Consumerism: the stupid faith that consumer products will make you happy.
If we really saw war, what war does to young minds and bodies, it would be impossible to embrace the myth of war. Chris Hedges
The Democratic Party needs no prompting to defend the elite. It's a full member of the club. Chris Hedges
The NY Times is an entrenched source of power and does not serve those who are neediest well or at all. -Doug McGill
RT @RacismFacts: According to the book American Apartheid: Segregation and the Making of the Underclass, the US is an apartheid state.
Free-market capitalism, a distinctly illiberal belief system, defines liberal thought. -Chris Hedges
The inability of the liberal class to address our reality leaves the disenfranchised open to manipulation by demagogues. -Chris Hedges
RT @MARTlNLUTHERK: It is time to make revolution live in the dialogues between the youth.
All the promises of the free market have turned out to be lies. -Chris Hedges
The 'patriotic' citizen retreats into tribal identity in a desperate attempt to maintain self-worth. -Chris Hedges
RT @DearShopaholics: Control your mind, become alert, political, revolutionary; learn about how consumption is a politically subservient ac…
Capitalism is plunging us into neofeudalism. -Chris Hedges
Success, as the world judges it, should never be the criterion for the life of resistance. -Chris Hedges
RT @Anti_Reform: Reformists are cowards whose political view is predicated on delay tactics.
The corporate media, which abet our national amnesia, speak in empty slogans handed to them by corporate paymasters. -Chris Hedges
The indifference to the plight of others and the cult of the self is what the corporate state seeks to instill in us. -Chris Hedges
RT @HumanityNeeds: More revolutionary spirit, less pop culture rubbish
MLK called America the 'greatest purveyor of violence in the world.' That quote doesn't make it into many MLK Day celebrations. -Hedges
You don't stick a knife into a man's back 9 inches, pull it out 6 inches, and call it progress. -Malcolm X
RT @OvertDictionary: The Church: it is an institution which entertains the masses with the afterlife to keep them submissive in this life.
People never realize their human potential because the power to innovate and decide is reserved for top men. -Colin Ward
Rebellion chips away, however imperceptibly, at the edifice of the oppressor. -Chris Hedges
RT @_Che___Guevara_: The IMF-World Bank-Wall Street complex is destroying cultures, communities, and the natural fabric of human society.
Struggle changes those who take part in it by shaking off the servile traits produced by hierarchy. Chuck
Assembly and community must arise from within the revolutionary process itself. -Chuck
RT @Things_U_Need: Revolutionary circles, these networks of resistance are vital to the expansion of the revolutionary machine.
How strange that human beings can be so sensitive about an animal, yet can dismiss 'collateral damage.' -Dave Lindorff
The revolution is not about putting a different kind of person in power but a different kind of power in people. -Stephanie Van Hook
RT @Anti_Reform: Reform is designed to weaken the revolutionary spirit of the people.
I may die as one, but I will come back in millions. (Tupac Katari)
